none: Stand Up - The Blunt Reality Of Conformity
Stand Up - The Blunt Reality Of Conformity

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on August 17, 2024 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Got a killer box of heat from Indonesia a couple of weeks ago, and though I've only my journey it's clear I made the right choice by just saying "uhhhh, I guess I'll take all of them." The LAST DRIVE tape that went up last week is a solid DIY street punk slammer, but this shit....? STAND UP gonna melt your damn face off. As tempted as I am to dissect the pieces of other subgenres that make up The Blunt Reality Of Conformity, this is really just a ripping and relentless hardcore punk tape and I'm not really sure what more you need to hear. THE BLUNT REALITY OF CONFORMITY
